content: such a fun market bag it works up quickly great reusable shopping bag and is a wonderful alternative to disposable plastic bags free written pattern & video tutorial available at heather s craft corner 1 video tutorial of the full pattern can also be found here 2 left-handed video tutorial is here 3 happy crocheting 1 https //www heatherscraftcorner com/day-at-the-market-bag/ 2 https //youtu be/xqxrcsa_urg 3 https //youtu be/g4zg6e6vkem
